mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (original_file_name, upload_file_name, upload_file_path, upload_file_url, related_idx, upload_file_ext) VALUES( #{originalFileName}, #{uploadFileName}, #{uploadFilePath}, #{uploadFileUrl}, #{relatedIdx}, #{uploadFileExt} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM file WHERE upload_file_url = #{profileImg} AND related_idx = #{idx} AND upload_file_path = #{path}
mapper.select: SELECT upload_file_name FROM file WHERE upload_file_url = #{profileImg} AND related_idx = #{idx} AND upload_file_path = #{path}
